CryptoParty on Feb 20th

29 Jan 2013

The first Dallas CryptoParty will be held on February 20th at 7PM at the Dallas Makerspace The topic for the first meeting will be "Email and GPG". Attendance is free, please bring your laptops. To help us gauge how many people will be attending please either tweet me @scottjosh, email me josh@wtftacos.com, or register here http://www.eventbrite.com/org/3203119978  

Josh Scott
Privacy, Civil Rights, Social Justice, Activism, Hacking, InfoSec, Programming. I do #CryptoParty in DFW.
